Text:
fyi...this episode was basically only a "look back" at various "moments."  In retrospect, I don't think it was worth the time to download.

But thanks for uploading all the same.
Super disappointing episode after more than a month off.  As was mentioned above, at least 80% of this episode is nothing more than clips from previous episodes, and the new content isn't that funny.

I was disappointed too.  A clip show?  Are you kidding me?  I stopped my DVR recording, erased it, and walked away to do something else.  But then I found myself back in the room toward the end of the show, and they did a wonderfully edited and very moving history of the relationship between Pam & Jim, and to a lesser extent the office as a whole.  I was in tears.  I tried to re-record the show, but the next one had started so it wouldn't let me.  Which is why I'm here.

I don't download many episodes of The Office, but that ending makes it worthwhile.
